html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-18752009-11-19,  ,  ,  PSEP, 
ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Corrections and Conditional Release Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CORRECTIONS AND CONDITIONAL RELEASE REGULATIONS, to reduce from three to two the number of Board members required to make decisions in federal conditional release cases. Changes would be made so that sections147, 148, and 150 of the CCRR will now refer to the use of two members.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0308 Publication Date: 2009-12-09
AttachmentsAttachment
